reviews.text: I agree with the other posts -- this is an exceptionally clean and well run hotel for it's class. Good value for money, efficient and friendly staff, plus a free hearty breakfast. Will definitely stay here again.
reviews.title: Agree with others - It's great!

likes.liked: — Cleaniness and size of the room
likes.disliked: — It's entrance was a bit nondescript and hard to find.

reviews.text: My husband and I stayed here for two days at the end of May. We had just finished staying at a hotel in Richmond, BC - Canada that was the same price and was awful so we were not expecting much from the Hawthorn Inn. They may not be a five star hotel but they certainly try to be. Great service, very clean & spacious rooms. The hot buffet breakfast included in the price was another wow for us. Okay, it wasn't a huge selection but it was hot & fresh.... and FREE.
reviews.title: Wow, So Impressed!
Overall an enjoyable experience
reviews.text: It is right near the Prime Outlet mall and the Casino. We are not gamblers but thought the Casino might be a good place to have dinner but the buffet which didnt look all that great was $20 US each so I guess the Casino is hoping people win a little money that they wont mind spending in the restaurant. I guess we were expecting Vegas buffet prices.
This hotel is about half an hour from Seattle and that was just fine with us because we were on holidays and in no rush for anything.
reviews.title: Very Nice Accommodations

reviews.text: Great stay, would absolutely recommend and will no doubt be back.
reviews.title: Great place, great value, would recommend
Highly recommended!
reviews.text: My girlfriend and I stayed at the Hawthorne for just 1 night over the Memorial weekend. We drove down from Vancouver for a shopping day at the Seattle Outlet Mall which is about 5 minutes south on the I-5. There's an overnight shopping package which includes a foot massage and a credit towards the Outlet Mall but we booked too late. Apparently, they need about 48 hrs notice for the spa and credit voucher so I can't comment on the spa. The shopping was quite good though and there's a very nice large casino right next to it (I think it was called Tulalip or something like that. I went there after my feet got sore from following my girlfriend around.

reviews.title: We will return!
reviews.text: The hotel is set in an odd area (on a side road facing a car dealership tucked just east off of the I-5), however it was very well landscaped including a Koi goldfish pond. The inside was modern and appealing to the eye. We didn't use the pool (looked a bit small) or hot tub due to time constraints. The check-in was quick and painless with a very friendly front desk clerk who provided information on nearby restaurants. All staff that we encountered were friendly and helpful.

reviews.title: What a lovely place to stay..............
reviews.text: We booked a room with a king size bed, jetted tub, vcr/dvd player and a large balcony. It was quite roomy and much better than I had expected for a town the size of Arlington. My only complaint is that the water pressure for the shower wasn't that great.

reviews.title: It's Like Heaven On Earth.
reviews.text: A buffet breakfast was included with our room and was quite decent. Overall, I would rate the hotel an 8.5. It proved to be an excellent value for the buck. We will return and try out the spa next time!
